title: 02/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to breaking news out of the NFL: Carson Wentz is traded to the Colts and Colin immediately puts Indianapolis in his Super Bowl bubble. He talks about the future of the Steelers as they are now faced with an aging quarterback and limited options on replacing him. Plus, Super Bowl champion head coach Bruce Arians joins the show to tell Colin what it was like to coach Tom Brady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
